channel.title: Need someone with myBB experience and TV!
channel.description: I'm stumped on making my website and if someone could show me how to edit some things i'd more than appreciate it! I do believe its something simple such as making an html file or something but i'm literally clueless. I'm just trying to change portal, members, and search at the top of the screen to Webclient, Vote, and Donate and make them work. I have skype and teamviewer!

item.title: Need someone with myBB experience and TV!
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

go into the admin panel and look for “templates” on the left hand side. Click your template and a list should come up. Choose headers/header etc. after you clicks headers another dropdown list will appear. Click the first “header”.

After that you will see the code which contains your navigation bar. change to whatchya want.
If I wasnt enough than just google “how to change navigation bar on mybb”

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone with myBB experience and TV!
